name: New Portfolio
description: This is a static web-based app built from HTML, CSS, and JS programming language. It is for showcasing the developer's knowledge and level in the tech industry.

name: Simple Computer Student Information Management System
description: This is a Windows-based simple-to-use Student Information Management System (SIMS) designed for computer students, developed from C# Programming Language's framework named WinForms.

name: TechWannabe Pet Collections
description: This is a web-based e-commerce system developed from two frameworks of the C# programming language, the ASP.NET Blazor as the frontend and the ASP.NET MVC as the backend, in the form of an API. It is for selling pets.

name: Porfolio Website
description: This is a pure static website built from HTML and CSS. It is for showcasing the developer's knowledge and level in the tech industry.

name: NumSys-C Mobile Application
description: This is an Android mobile learning app developed using C# Programming Language's old framework named Xamarin Forms. It helps the user interact with and understand the true language of computers, the binary number system, and many more.
